content: after 13 years a court case has finally come to an end with a final resolution the plaintiffs have been granted ownership of various properties including apartments land and a workshop the court has determined how these properties will be divided among the parties involved the defendants have been ordered to pay a monthly sum to the plaintiffs as compensation the court has also addressed claims regarding improvements made to the properties and the rental value of certain units the costs of the case will be paid by the estate judge dr ms made the final ruling disregarding objections the ruling grants specific parties ownership of different properties and lands these include apartments lands in different zones a real estate unit a workshop and lands the ruling also assigns a historic villa and land to another party the ruling orders certain parties to pay a monthly amount to the party assigned the workshop and lands the remaining claims are dismissed and the parties will be compensated for the litigation costs the ruling also includes the appointment of an expert and settles the expenses the ruling was made on june 17 2020 in catania
